sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect} from 'react' import {Row, Col, ListGroup, Button, Image, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' const ProductScreen = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const {id} = useParams(); const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const {loading, error , product} = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(id)) },[dispatch,id]); return (
{loading ? : error ? {error} : (

{product.name}

 {/* */}

${product.price}

 {product.description}
Status :
{product.countInStock > 0 ? `Only ${product.countInStock} left`: 'Out of Stock'}
 )}
) } export default ProductScreen
